name: Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku 3 - Sekai Taikai-hen
summary:
Sub-characters can also change clothes!? Let's enjoy the even more evolved "Shizuku World"!!
Tokyo in the early summer of 2XX9, one year after the world expedition.

Shizuku Asagiri, the captain of the Aoo High School beach volleyball club, was practicing hard every day with Suzu Kamishima, a junior who is small but has a great sense of volleyball.

It was a pair of Shizuku & Bells who challenged the preliminary round of the world tournament looking forward to the reunion with Haruna, a former partner and Shizuku's best friend, but what was waiting for the two there ......!?

The days of hot and brilliant games will start again!!

There are up to 16 characters in the series! In addition to the nostalgic characters that appeared in "1" and "2", you can also see new characters!

In this game, you can switch the operation characters during the game, and you can choose and play your favorite character in the "World Tour Mode" that wins all 4 races!

The story changes depending on the result of the game and how the adventure part proceeds. Once the scenario is cleared, you can play it again from any point.

The combination technique explodes! In addition to the special spikes that accumulate and hit the power gauge, the strongest special move "Combination Technique" released in cooperation with pair characters has been newly added.

When the gauge bar becomes MAX and is in the flashing state, it is activated with the receive of the pair character, and if you hit the ball with a special spike, it will be a super powerful spike.
Please use the spikes according to the war situation to advance the game advantageously and grasp the victory!

In addition, in addition to collecting familiar swimsuits and character profiles, it is full of fun and highlights that are not limited to collection elements, such as the release of "Haruna's Blog".
